def Chart_Maker(df,X,Y,c = "label"):
    """
        X - value in X-axis
        Y - value in Y-axis
        c - Color scheme
        """
    chart = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
                x = X, #axis
                y = Y,
                color = c        
    )
    display(chart)
